sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>fix sys_highlighted_value to set display field</description>
        <name>fix sys_highlighted_value  display field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
dictionaryRecord.addQuery("name", "sys_highlighted_value");
dictionaryRecord.addQuery("element", "field");
dictionaryRecord.query();
if (dictionaryRecord.next()){
	dictionaryRecord.setValue("display", true);
	dictionaryRecord.update();
}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-06-05 00:56:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3ed287c453111010ac9bddeeff7b12bd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>fix sys_highlighted_value  display field</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Highlighted Values" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.highlighted_values">43fa7c203c35311068bcf327dfe37f61</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3ed287c453111010ac9bddeeff7b12bd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-06-05 01:52:21</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
